## EventEmitter class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

事件发射器

订阅事件 见<!-- -->.subscribe()

发射事件 见[emit()](./eventemitter.eventemitter.emit.md)

销毁 见[dispose()](./eventemitter.eventemitter.dispose.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EventEmitter<EventType = any> extends Subject<EventType> 
```
